actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to repeal the mandatory child day care requirements which are presently contained therein.

summary.text: Amends the program of Grants to States for Services of the Social Security Act to repeal Federal child day care requirements, and to require adherence of child day care plans to published State standards of such care.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to repeal the mandatory child day care requirements which are presently contained therein.
